Seven Languages in Seven Weeks

This is a blog about the \#7languages7weeks challenge.

  • About
  • Wiki

Home

This is a boilerplate for use in Github Pages. It is based on The HTML5 Boilerplate, and comes with jQuery and text.css from 960.gs. Octocat icon from designmoo.

Instructions

  1. fork this repo
  2. rename this repo to user.github.com
  3. edit _config.yml
  4. edit index.html
  5. edit _includes/style.css
  6. navigate to user.github.com and enjoy

Changes From Html5 Boilerplate

mkdir _layouts _posts _includes
mv index.html _layouts/default.html

Templates were added, things were removed.
